name: Railway Empire - Mexico
description: <h3>Feature List</h3><p></p><ul><li>New scenario: “Viva Mexico!” (1873-1893)<br/></li><li>Map expansion: Mexico (available in Free Game and Sandbox modes)<br/></li><li>New goods (e.g. coffee and sugar) and more than 24 new cities<br/></li><li>New engines: Fairlie (0-6-6-0) and Stirling (4-2-2) <br/></li><li>Explore the world of Railway Empire in a new exclusive night mode</li></ul><br/><h3>About the Game</h3>Discover the diversity of Mexico - take on new and challenging missions in the arid northern regions all the way to the dense jungles in the south of the country. Boost Mexico’s economy in the new scenario by building a thriving infrastructure and exporting to the USA.
